name: Advanced Materials

pages.text: As you progress in TFC, you may want for stronger and prettier building materials, as well as some devices you may remember from vanilla. One such material is $(thing)Stone Bricks$(), which are made with $(thing)Bricks$() and $(thing)Mortar$().
Bricks can turned into cracked bricks with a $(thing)Hammer$().
Mortar can be used to make $(thing)Hardened Stone$(), a kind of raw stone that does not collapse.
